The breasts must be palpated for any lumps or tenderness. If there are lumps or tenderness,

c. Abdominal Examination
Abdominal examination helps you to monitor the progress of pregnancy andfoetal growth, check for foetal lie and 
presentationand auscultate foetal heart sounds.
